articles.title: Israel's Eurovision entry under scrutiny over alleged reference to Hamas - BBC.com
articles.description: Israel's song is alleged to have references to last year's Hamas attacks, breaking neutrality rules.
articles.content:
By Mark SavageBBC Music Correspondent
Israel will be represented by Eden Golan at this year's contest
Israel says it will pull out of the Eurovision Song Contest if organisers try to censor its ent… [+4442 chars]
